CustomField.formula: (VALUE(TEXT(Last_Month_s_Action_Items__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Coverage_of_Our_Pipeline__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Collateral_Review__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Partner_Pipeline_Review__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Other_Action_Items_Section__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Wrap_Up_Section__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Commitments_From_Meeting__c ))+ (VALUE(TEXT(Director_Discretion__c ))*4)+ IF(ISPICKVAL( Building_Rapport__c ,'Yes'),5,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL( Shared_Good_News__c ,'Yes'),5,0))/100
CustomField.label: Partner Meeting Score
